GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v6.0.16
GSD.description:
net: dsa: tag_8021q: avoid leaking ctx on dsa_tag_8021q_register() error path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.16 by commit 39691d51af99f80efb9e365f94b8e0c791fa1a2f, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 328621f6131f667c5c328bb72d45442fd76efb81. For more details please see the references link.
